TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRANSACTION_ID_TRIG
TriggerOraclev10g.ownerDesignName: Banking App II the SQL ERD
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
IF INSERTING THEN
SELECT transaction_id_seq.nextVal INTO :new.transaction_id FROM DUAL;
ELSIF UPDATING THEN
SELECT :old.transaction_id INTO :new.transaction_id FROM DUAL;
END IF;
END;
